summary: ICP starter application scaffolded with a Motoko backend canister and a React (Vite) + Tailwind + shadcn/ui frontend, including Internet Identity integration, actor/query hooks, build/deploy templates, generated brand assets, and a frontend personalization panel persisted to local storage.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Base Motoko backend (main.mo) with generated Candid bindings and frontend declarations wired for local/dev deployment.

existing_features.title: React (Vite) + Tailwind frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend app bootstrap with Vite, Tailwind styling, shared config, and base App/main entrypoints.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library included
existing_features.description: Large set of prebuilt shadcn/ui components added under src/components/ui and configured for the project.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Hooks/utilities for Internet Identity login and authenticated canister actor creation (useInternetIdentity, useActor).

existing_features.title: Query and state hooks for canister calls
existing_features.description: Frontend query utilities/hooks for organizing canister queries and caching patterns (useQueries).

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP project structure
existing_features.description: Build template files (Dockerfile, deploy scripts, canister.yaml, workspace configs) enabling reproducible builds and deployment flow.

existing_features.title: Generated frontend brand assets pipeline
existing_features.description: Scripts and generated images added (prune/resize utilities and generated hero/pattern PNGs under public/assets/generated).

existing_features.title: Custom ESLint rules for ICP frontend constraints
existing_features.description: Adds project-specific ESLint rules to enforce ICP/Internet Identity integration expectations (e.g., requiring an Internet Identity provider wiring) and to prevent using BigInt values in query keys.

existing_features.title: Frontend StorageClient utility
existing_features.description: Utility wrapper for browser storage access (StorageClient) to centralize persistence logic used by the frontend.

existing_features.title: Frontend personalization panel with local persistence
existing_features.description: Adds a PersonalizationPanel UI with default personalization configuration and a useLocalStorageState-based persistence layer (via StorageClient/localStorage) to save and restore user UI preferences across sessions.

existing_features.title: Remove the personalization option from the website UI by eliminating the PersonalizationPanel entry point (the fixed “Personalize” button and its sheet) so users can no longer open or use personalization controls.

Remove the dependency on personalization state and local persistence so the Valentine page renders with fixed copy and behavior without reading from or writing to localStorage (including removing useLocalStorageState usage for personalization settings).

Remove the word “flower” (and plural forms like “flowers”) from all user-facing website text and attributes, including but not limited to subtitles, success-state copy, and image alt text, replacing those lines with equivalent Valentine-themed wording that does not include the word “flower”.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the personalization option from the Valentine website UI
Remove the word "flower" from the Valentine website content/theme text

architectural_notes: Project uses a two-canister layout (backend + frontend assets) with generated Candid/TypeScript declarations for typed frontend interaction.
Frontend authentication is handled via Internet Identity; actor creation is abstracted into hooks to enable authenticated/anonymous calls.
Frontend build is Vite-based with Tailwind and shadcn/ui; component sources are vendored into the repo under src/components/ui.
Asset pipeline includes scripts to resize/prune generated images and stores outputs under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Frontend codebase includes custom ESLint rules to enforce ICP-specific constraints (e.g., Internet Identity provider wiring and query-key BigInt restrictions).
Frontend includes a personalization system (defaults + UI panel) with state persisted locally (useLocalStorageState + StorageClient/localStorage).
projectName: Remove personalization UI and remove the word “flower” from all site text
